page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: BATTLE IS AN ANCIENT VILLAGE WHICH HAS BEGUN TO GROW QUITE RAPIDLY IN THE TWENTIETH CENTURY. THE VILLAGE CENTRE DATES FROM THE MIDDLE AGES, AND MOST OF THE SMALL TERRACED HOUSES HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO SHOPS WITH FLATS ABOVE. ALTHOUGH THESE HOUSES ARE SMALL, THEY ARE VERY EXPENSIVE BECAUSE THEY CONTAIN SO MANY QUAINT FEATURES SUCH AS LEADED WINDOWS AND EXPOSED BEAMS. TOWARDS THE EDGE OF THE VILLAGE THE HOUSES ARE MORE MODERN, LARGER AND USUALLY DETATCHED. MOST OF THESE WERE BUILT IN THE 1930'S, ALTHOUGH THERE ARE SOME NEW HOUSES ON THE VERY EDGE OF THE VILLAGE. ALL HOUSING IN BATTLE IS EXPENSIVE, AND THERE IS ONLY A SMALL AMOUNT OF COUNCIL HOUSING AVAILABLE. HOUSING IS LIKELY TO BECOME EVEN MORE EXPENSIVE WHEN THE RAILWAY LINK TO LONDON IS IMPROVED NEXT YEAR.
